name: Play God
description: You meet this man who's main mission is to kill you. He can't do it directly, he'll make you commit suicide. You get to Play God, and see your loved ones die. You have to. He forces you to, you've got no choice. But find out more about this man and see something. It has go to on. It has to. The cycle has to go on! THE CYCLE GOES ON! SAVE THE WHOLE OF MAN!!! JUST COME ON!!! You see a higher power. HE WHO STARTED IT ALL! HE WHO STARTED IT ALL! YOU NEED TO DEFY HIS WORD! TO SAVE OURSELVES! Goodbye. My work here is done. Give one thing up for another. Give one thing up for another. Trade. Just TRADE!
